snippet.title: Teenage Blob Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
“Half game. Half album. All awesome! A colourful art-punk adventure towards the best night of your life in a unique split release from Team Lazerbeam and The Superweaks!”

Wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1096060/Teenage_Blob

We're beyond stoked to unveil our next project; a unique split release between Team Lazerbeam and our friends The Superweaks! They made six radical songs, we made 6 genre-busting games, and tied everything together into one tale of bands, butts and bootleg battletoads!

Join us on the Team Lazerbeam Discord and follow our adventures as we work towards birthing our mutant game baby!
https://discord.gg/T5P9vbt
